sections.title: Passage 1 - Academic
sections.description: Read the passage about climate change
sections.passage_text: Climate change is one of the most pressing issues of our time. Rising global temperatures are causing significant changes to our planet's ecosystems. Scientists have documented increases in extreme weather events, rising sea levels, and shifts in wildlife populations.

sections.title: Passage 2 - General
sections.description: Read the passage about renewable energy
sections.passage_text: Renewable energy sources such as solar and wind power are becoming increasingly important. These clean energy alternatives reduce our dependence on fossil fuels and help combat climate change. Many countries are investing heavily in renewable energy infrastructure.
